name: Ugh. @Hulu has been so unreliable lately. What’s the point of a DVR if I can’t watch anything it records? I think it might be time to evaluate alternatives for live TV again.

content.html: Ugh. @Hulu has been so unreliable lately. What’s the point of a DVR if I can’t watch anything it records? I think it might be time to evaluate alternatives for live TV again.

summary: Apologies, Jonathan! Just to clarify, was something set to record but isn't appearing in your Cloud DVR or are you having trouble playing a recording? If the latter, notice any change after trying: hulu.tv/PlaybackHelp-? We'll be on the lookout for your reply!

summary: I think we’re about to pull the plug and just let go of live tv. I think the only thing we NEED live is sports the rare occasions we watch it. So we’ll probably subscribe to ESPN during those months.

content.html: I think we’re about to pull the plug and just let go of live tv. I think the only thing we NEED live is sports the rare occasions we watch it. So we’ll probably subscribe to ESPN during those months.
